UINT8 XFuXMFormatSample::mType
 

Bit 0-1:

  • 0 = No loop
  • 1 = Forward loop
  • 2 = Ping-pong loop
    Bit 4: 16-bit sample data

Definition at line 177 of file XFuXMPlayer_internal.h.
